channel.title: 317 - npc spawns when pressing object / item on ground
channel.description:
how to i make when i press on a object a npc spawns and then it will automaticly attack someone?
this is Czar Based (Allstar) and im making a Coffin and when you try to open it a npc comes.. and attacks. i rep++ if it works, oh and how to i make an item that is on ground and spawns after some seconds/Minutes and is pickable? if you need ids in the code please put #'s so i know if i need id
Thanks //Leo

item.title: 317 - npc spawns when pressing object / item on ground
item.dc:creator: @Leoiscool Leoiscool
item.description:
@Leoiscool wrote:

i dont need kill requirments to open something, i need to open something and a npc spaws… thats different

Read full topic

item.title: 317 - npc spawns when pressing object / item on ground
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Leoiscool, post:3, topic:396645”]the problem is in barrows you kill and the last enemy it drops a key… to use on the chest[/quote]Look at how it is made in another source then and convert it to czar. It isn’t hard to make it a requirement for all brothers to be killed to open the chest.

Read full topic
